keyword: how many calories in a mcdonalds ice cream cone
title: How Many Calories in a McDonald's Ice Cream Cone?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a McDonald's ice cream cone, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in a McDonald's Ice Cream Cone?
assumptions: Standard vanilla soft serve ice cream cone from McDonald's menu; approximately 103 g serving, no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, and serving size. Check McDonald's app or website for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A McDonald's vanilla ice cream cone contains about 200 calories with 5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a McDonald's vanilla cone?
faqs.a: Approximately 200 calories for the standard size.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a McDonald's ice cream cone?
faqs.a: About 34 g carbs, mostly from sugars at 25 g.

faqs.q: Is there fiber in McDonald's ice cream cone?
faqs.a: No dietary fiber; it's 0 g per cone.

faqs.q: How much fat and protein in a McDonald's cone?
faqs.a: 5 g total fat (3 g saturated) and 5 g protein.

faqs.q: Does McDonald's cone have trans fat?
faqs.a: 0 g trans fat in the standard vanilla cone.
